item.title: CC2P - Convert CSV to Parquet Files
item.description: (CC2P) is a Rust-based project that converts CSV files in a selected folder into parquet format. This tool provides a simple and efficient way of handling and converting your CSV data files. Installation & Usage Link to heading Prerequisites Link to heading Rust 1.74 Building Link to heading Provide instructions on how to build the project, for example, installing the Rust compiler and necessary crates. Here is how to install the cc2p directly from crates.
